content:
# Recruitment for Erasmus+ KA171 – Third Countries Not Associated to the Programme-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/students/news/detail/recruitment-for-erasmus-ka171-third-countries-not-associated-with-the-programme
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:20

Recruitment for Erasmus+ KA171 – Third Countries Not Associated to the Programme 

 11-03-2025 

 The AGH University Centre for International Affairs invites students, doctoral students and academic staff to participate in the recruitment for Erasmus+ Mobility of higher education students and staff with third countries not associated to the Programme (KA171). 

Within the latest project, the AGH University has received funds for the exchange of students, doctoral students and academic staff with universities from the following countries: Albania, Algeria, Argentina, Armenia, Bangladesh, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Canada, Kazakhstan, Nepal, South Africa, the USA and the United Arab Emirates.

The deadline for submitting applications is 
31 March 2025
.

The regulations, application forms, list of partner institutions and detailed rules of the mobility are available on the website of the AGH University Centre for International Affairs: 
Erasmus+ KA171 – Third countries not associated to the 2024-2027 programme

Back
